summary: This documentary movie covers two concerts at the Fox Theatre in St. Louis, Missouri, to celebrate Chuck Berry's 60th birthday, and also discusses his life and career.
cast: Chuck Berry|Ingrid Berry|Eric Clapton|Robert Cray|Bo Diddley|Ahmet Ertegun|Don Everly|Phil Everly|Etta James|Johnnie Johnson|Steve Jordan|Bobby Keys|Chuck Leavell|John Lennon|Julian Lennon|Jerry Lee Lewis|Little Richard|Roy Orbison|Keith Richards|Robbie Robertson|Linda Ronstadt|Joey Spampinato|Bruce Springsteen|Mark Hale
keywords: lip synching|repetition in title|concert film|concert footage|character name in title
title: Chuck Berry: Hail! Hail! Rock 'n' Roll
